channel.title: Python on Guanghua Mao's website
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Guanghua Mao's website

item.title: The Essentials of Python
item.description: 1. About Python 3 Python is a modern, object-oriented scripting language. There’s a core philosophy behind the Python language, which includes the following statements: Beautiful is better than ugly. It’s always a good idea to make your code elegant and readable. Explicit is better than implicit. Don’t make your readers guess what your code does, make it obvious. Simple is better than complex. If you can make it simple, do.

item.title: The Fundamentals of Programming
item.description: Introduction Now more than ever, you hear about the importance of STEM education and the need for qualified computer programmers. This article is designed for you, someone who’s curious to pull back the curtains and explore the world of computer programming. I’ll walk you through your first line of code, explain the core concepts needed to write useful programs, and take a peek at several programming languages along the way.
